text: location accessibility service good bed toilet. breakfast time frame on sunday
Good location Good breakfast. Bathroom was way too small Very small elevator

Clean good size rooms and bathroom Staff friendly and helpful Good location. Accessibility of hotel on busy road Difficult to reach to find out where to park then to park across the road and then haul bags to reception to check in
Good location nice breakfast very very clean. no elevator need to climb with luggage
Very good breakfast Great location. As in most London locations small rooms and small elevator
Good location near underground station There is kitchen in a room. there is no elevator
Good breakfast lovely rooms and great location right around the corner from north ealing station. No elevator
location is very good The bar is excellent. Very noisy room next to elevator Constant noise all night
Good location Friendly and helpful staff Spacious room Nice and free coffee at lobby Good kitchenette in the room Has a perfectly working elevator
Friendly staff and good location. Only one elevator so some time you have to wait to get to your room
Very good and quiet location. Room located next to the service elevator shaft Disturbing and noisy Hotel pretty worn out and requires immediate investment
The rooms were well equipped and clean Very good location Staff were good. The elevator system was cumbersome two elevators and having to hold the button The rooms were small
Great location Very good value for money Clean and comfertable rooms Very good breakfast. Extremly Slow elevator There is only one shared by guests and staff Very narrow corridors between rooms
Classy staff Good buffet both breakfast and dinner. Elevator small old and slow Rooms very small Location excellent for Buckingham Palace but at least five blocks from tube
Good location for getting around Most of the staff was helpful Good breakfast Very clean. Top floor is awful Beds are old and the street side is noisy even late at night No elevator
Friendly staff excellebt location and good infrastucture. To some rooms there is no direct elevator so you have to go over stairs which is not so pleasant with lugagge
good location nice staff nice ground floor common area with meeting rooms. I was expecting a breakfast at a 4 for 259 pounds per night 4 floors hotel but no elevator
The location is very good and there are plenty of great restos and pubs around. The elevator is broken and the room is soooo hot as the aircon is not getting cold
A great location good layout of the room. No elevator This was not a problem as my luggage was light but with a heavy suitcase or for older people this could be a problem

Location was very good Staff extremely friendly and helpful Plenty of sights transportation and restaurants within walking distance Great breakfast. Room was a lil cramped and the elevator claustrophobic but really couldn t complain much
